install.name: Content - CodeCitation
install.author: Konstantin Nizhegorodov (konstantin.nizhegorodov@gmail.com)

install.description: The CodeCitation plugin allows you to include code sections in your Joomla 1.5 content using {codecitation} or custom tag. Use of the {codecitation} tag allows you to work with code sections in your Joomla WYSIWIG editors. Plugin uses SyntaxHighlighter 2.0 library from http://alexgorbatchev.com/wiki/SyntaxHighlighter Supports: syntax highlighting for ActionScript3, Bash/shell, C#, C++, CSS, Delphi, Diff, Groovy, JavaScript, Java, JavaFX, Perl, PHP, Plain Text, PowerShell, Python, Ruby, Scala, SQL, Visual Basic, XML, HTML, XSLT Usage example: {codecitation style="brush: xml;"}CODE HERE{/codecitation}

param.name: theme
param.label: Color theme
param.description: Select color theme you preffer for the plugin

param.name: alternativetag
param.label: Alternative tag to trigger the plugin usage.
param.description: If you think that {codecitation} is too long and preffer shorter syntax, feel free to specify your own tag. For example: code

param.name: defaultlang
param.label: Default language to cite
param.description: If you cite mostly code writen on particular language, you are able to specify it here and ommit brush name in codecitation tag usage (shorten syntax).

param.name: auto-links
param.label: Auto-links
param.description: Allows you to turn detection of links in the codecitation block on and off. If the option is turned off, URLs won't be clickable.

param.name: collapse
param.label: Collapse
param.description: Allows you to force citation block on the page to be collapsed by default.

param.name: gutter
param.label: Gutter
param.description: Allows you to turn gutter with line numbers on and off by default.

param.name: smart-tabs
param.label: Smart tabs
param.description: Allows you to turn smart tabs feature on and off by default.

param.name: tab-size
param.label: Tab size
param.decription: Allows you to adjust default tab size.

param.name: wrap-lines
param.label: Wrap lines
param.description: Allows you to turn line wrapping feature on and off by default.
